name: Silent Thrill
description:
You are an average guy who has received his new Paystation 13. Full of anticipation, you put in the new horror game "Silent Thrill". Everything starts to shake and before you know it you are in a wooden hut far away from home. You have to banish a path through the ghost forest and solve the puzzles in the house to return to your normal life. 


CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Interact

HINT: (SPOILER WARNING)

  • Forest - Search for the key in the South-East and for the door in the North. 
  • Riddle 1 - Piano
  • Riddle 2 - Television

CREDITS:

  • Code - Benny and Richard 
  • Art - Limezu

FUTURE UPDATES:
